profile_summary:
As a Senior Rust Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong expertise in **Rust** and **Golang**, and proficiency in **TypeScript**. I focus on developing robust applications grounded in security best practices, including authentication and authorization frameworks like **OAuth** and **OIDC**. My background in building secure, microservices-based architectures has equipped me with the skills necessary for identity and access management, as well as asynchronous workflows.

In my previous roles, I have demonstrated strong problem-solving abilities, curiosity, and adaptability while collaborating effectively within teams. I am dedicated to continuous learning and mentoring fellow developers, and I actively participate in code reviews to promote best practices. My technical proficiency and strategic approach ensure the successful delivery of high-performance solutions tailored to meet both user needs and compliance standards.
